alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer; Le Flore (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 5:42PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Haskell, northern Latimer and northwestern Le Flore Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 542 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles northwest of Mc Curtain to 3 miles north of Red Oak to 2 miles southeast of Robbers Cave State Park. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Stigler... Keota... Red Oak... Mccurtain... Bokoshe... Kinta... Robbers Cave State Park... Mc Curtain... Lequire... Kanima... Panola... Milton... Lewisville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
